subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets acquired their second starting pitcher in two days yesterday, obtaining the left-handed Dave Williams from the Cincinnati Reds in exchange for the minor league pitcher Robert Manuel. They immediately optioned Williams to Class AAA Norfolk. Williams, 27, was 2-3 with a 7.20 earned run average in eight starts for the Reds before he was designated for assignment Saturday.
snippet: The Mets acquired their second starting pitcher in two days yesterday, obtaining the left-handed Dave Williams from the Cincinnati Reds in exchange for the minor league pitcher Robert Manuel. They immediately optioned Williams to Class AAA Norfolk....
